file.name: currency-conversion-spec.yaml
file.content:

openapi: 3.0.3
info:
  title: "Currency"
  version: "1.0"
  contact:
    url: https://github.com/apigee/devrel
  description: Mock API Specification for a Currency Converter
servers:
  - url: /mock/v1
tags:
  - name: mock
  - name: currency
  - name: fintech
paths:
  /currency/latest:
    get:
      summary: Get latest exchange rates
      operationId: get-latest-exchange-rates
      description: Get latest exchange rates
      tags:
        - currency
      responses:
        "200":
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/conversiontable"
              example:
                success: true
                base: GBP
                date: '2020-07-01'
                rates:
                  AUD: 1.86
                  CAD: 1.69
                  CHF: 1.17
                  CNY: 8.73
                  EUR: 1.10
                  JPY: 132.19
                  USD: 1.23
                internal-traceid: 123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000
  /currency/convert:
    get:
      summary: Convert Currency
      operationId: convert-currency
      description: Convert amount from base to target currency
      tags:
        - currency
      parameters:
        - name: from
          in: query
          description: base currency
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: to
          in: query
          description: target currency
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: amount
          in: query
          description: amount in base currency
          required: true
          schema:
            type: number
      responses:
        "200":
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/conversionresult"
              example:
                success: true
                query:
                  from: GBP
                  to: EUR
                  amount: 100
                info:
                  timestamp: 1519328414
                  rate: 1.10
                date: 2020-07-01
                result: 1110
                internal-traceid: 123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-679914174111
components:
  schemas:
    conversiontable:
      type: object
      properties:
        success:
          type: boolean
          description: Success Status
        base:
          type: string
          description: Base Currency
        date:
          type: string
          description: Date of the conversion table
        rates:
          type: object
          description: Exchange Rates
          properties:
            AUD:
              type: number
              description: AUD exchange rate
            CAD:
              type: number
              description: CAD exchange rate
            CHF:
              type: number
              description: CHF exchange rate
            CNY:
              type: number
              description: CNY exchange rate
            EUR:
              type: number
              description: EUR exchange rate
            JPY:
              type: number
              description: JPY exchange rate
            USD:
              type: number
              description: USD exchange rate
        internal-traceid:
          type: string
          description: Internal tracing ID
      required:
        - success
        - base
        - date
        - rates
        - internal-traceid
    conversionresult:
      type: object
      properties:
        success:
          type: boolean
          description: Success Status
        query:
          type: object
          description: conversion request
          properties:
            from:
              type: string
              description: Base Currency
            to:
              type: string
              description: Target Currency
            amount:
              type: number
              description: Base Currency
        info:
          type: object
          description: meta information on the conversion request
          properties:
            timestamp:
              type: integer
              description: timestamp of the exchange rate update
            rate:
              type: number
              description: exchange rate used
        date:
          type: string
          description: current date
        result:
          type: number
          description: Amount in target currency
        internal-traceid:
          type: string
          description: Internal tracing ID
      required:
        - success
        - query
        - info
        - date
        - result
        - internal-traceid
